scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../../Part_2/phonebook && npm run build -- prod && cp -r build ../../Part_3/phonebook_server
scripts.deploy: cd ../../../ && git subtree push --prefix Exercises/Part_3/phonebook_server heroku-phonebook master
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 'uibuild' && npm run deploy
